Basic CLI
==========
These are basic CLI for MeerSOLAR pipeline. 

1. The main CLI of MeerSOLAR is ``run_meersolar`` , which is used to run MeerSOLAR pipeline.
 
.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: run_meersolar -h
   
2. To view, measurement set details, use ``show_meersolar_ms`` .

.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: show_meersolar_ms -h
   
3. To view MeerSOLAR jobs status, use ``show_meersolar_status`` .

.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: show_meersolar_status -h
   
4. To see jobs logs using local GUI logger, use ``run_meerlogger`` .

.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: run_meerlogger -h
   
5. To update MeerSOLAR data, use ``init_meersolar_data`` .

.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: init_meersolar_data -h   
   
6. To stop a MeerSOLAR job in between, use ``kill_meersolar_job`` .

.. admonition:: Click here to see parameters
   :class: dropdown

   .. program-output:: kill_meersolar_job -h
